title: Please Help Identify Font
content:
Hi there I have tried several sites online (myfont, identifont, etc.) and can't figure out what font this is actually two different ones please see screen captures below and link to website.

Font 1: [http://i.imgur.com/Go2ZMZX.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102060139/http:/i.imgur.com/Go2ZMZX.png "http://i.imgur.com/Go2ZMZX.png")  
Font 2: [http://i.imgur.com/zQ8SVmQ.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102060139/http:/i.imgur.com/zQ8SVmQ.png "http://i.imgur.com/zQ8SVmQ.png")  
Site: [http://www.frankietoccos.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102060139/http:/www.frankietoccos.com/ "http://www.frankietoccos.com/")

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!
author: kinetic87

comments.content: The menu font is [Amienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102060139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/amienne), the other one [Vivaldi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102060139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/vivaldi/).

Can anyone help me identify what the "handwrighting" font is in this logo thank you kindly

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102060139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2012-signature_Black_independent_rep_5441.jpg)

mscott, in the future it's best to create a new post for your request. tagging onto someone else's may result in it being overlooked. and it gets confusing. as to your answer, or maybe an answer: [Marydale](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102060139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/3ip/marydale/regular/) looks good until you get to the S and g. not sure what's up with that.
Thank you soo much really appreciate it!
